title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS – Toyota LC Prado (2015 on) 2.8L 150s 1GD-FTV Diesel – ProVent Oil Catch Can Kit

content.rendered:
MANN+HUMMEL ProVent 200 Catch Can suits:

Toyota LC Prado (2015 on) 2.8L 150 Series

GDJ150R Turbo Diesel 4Cyl. 1GD-FTV CRD DOHC 16V

** ONLY suits Australian Delivered Vehicles

** OVERSEAS models will require modifications (NOT INCLUDED)

Advantages of MANN+Hummel ProVent Catch Cans

Compared to cheaper imports include:

Highly efficient oil separation providing ideal protection for the turbocharger and other components installed downstream. Less motor oil consumption in comparison to less efficient separators or conventional open systems. Maintenance friendly – fittings are not removed during element maintenance. Universal usage: exceptional for variable flow rates. Integrated safety feature against irregularly high crankcase pressure. Light and robust design with no electrical energy required. Compact design, low pressure loss, low running costs.

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Stainless Steel Bracket

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

This unit fits inline between hose from the top of the crankcase back to the air intake, removing oily sludge and condensation, saving your intercooler and turbo from blocking up ! The filter element is usually changed at about 40,000 kms intervals. Note:some engines more, some engines less !

For further installation information visit our Youtube Channel >

Individual replacement parts available.

Download PDF Installation Instructions >
